quest.name: Distract and Rescue
journal:
 Quest Sync
The Tholl tinkerer is looking for an outsider's help.
objectives: With the chat mode in Say, enter any phrase containing “Lali-ho” to distract the Gogg lookouts.

dialogue.name: MECHANISM03550
dialogue.text: Lali-ho! Oh, you couldn't have chosen a better time to visit!

dialogue.name: MECHANISM03550
dialogue.text: Those vile Goggs have stolen away my precious automaton! Stolen her away, and stashed her in some cluttered corner of their village with the rest of their ill-gotten goods...

dialogue.name: MECHANISM03550
dialogue.text: Problem is, I'm a drinker, not a fighter. And I doubt I could creep past their guards without one of them seeing me.

dialogue.name: MECHANISM03550
dialogue.text: That's where I need your help! If a Humean elfa strange dwarfa Mystela Galdjenta Drahna Ronsoa Viis like you were to walk in and distract them, then I could smuggle out my automaton with no one the wiser!

dialogue.name: MECHANISM03550
dialogue.text: I mean, you shouldn't be in any danger. Goggs and Tholls are mortal enemies, aye, but they don't attack other folk on sight. Usually.

dialogue.name: MECHANISM03550
dialogue.text: Let's move a little closer to Komra, and get this rescue mission underway! Don't you worry, my little bucket of bolts─you'll soon be home again!

dialogue.name: MECHANISM03550
dialogue.text: Do you see those two lookouts? Just walk up to them, bold as you please, and give a hearty “lali-ho!”

dialogue.name: MECHANISM03550
dialogue.text: Once you have their attention, tell them...oh, I don't know...that you saw a stinky Tholl sneaking about nearby or something. That should get them moving. Then I'll tiptoe in, grab my automaton, and meet you back here.

dialogue.name: MECHANISM03550
dialogue.text: Just belt out a happy “lali-ho,” then tell those lookouts you saw a Tholl nearby. Once they move off to investigate, I'll slip in and out, then meet you back here with my automaton. Sound like a plan?

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Lali-ho

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: With the chat mode in Say, use your keyboard or the software keyboard to enter any phrase containing “Lali-ho” to distract the Gogg lookouts.

dialogue.name: DWARFA03550
dialogue.text: Hm? You lookin' for trouble, stranger?

dialogue.name: DWARFA03550
dialogue.text: Lali-ho! What brings you to Komra?

dialogue.name: DWARFA03550
dialogue.text: What!? A stinkin', ugly Tholl!? I'll catch the bugger by his piss-drenched beard, and knock his helm clear into next week!

dialogue.name: DWARFB03550
dialogue.text: Lali-ho! What can the Gogg do for you?

dialogue.name: DWARFB03550
dialogue.text: A Tholl!? Here!? Aye, you did well to let me know. I'll soon take care of this lurker...

dialogue.name: MECHANISM03550
dialogue.text: Well done, lasslad! You played your part to perfection! As you can see, the rescue was a success!

dialogue.name: MECHANISM03550
dialogue.text: Come on back to Tomra, and we can talk rewards.

dialogue.name: MECHANISM03550
dialogue.text: Ever since there've been dwarves, it seems the Goggs have hated the Tholls. Although I'm not rightly sure why...

dialogue.name: MECHANISM03550
dialogue.text: Well, I know why we hate the Goggs! Their beards are unkempt, straggly messes, and the bastards dig in our mines without so much as a by-your-leave!

dialogue.name: MECHANISM03550
dialogue.text: Grrr, it makes my blood boil! Next time they come around, I'll be waiting with an automaton army! We'll make them wish they never left Komra, the thieving, scrounging curs!

dialogue.name: MECHANISM03550
dialogue.text: Oh, I almost forgot your reward. And I'll be keeping a closer eye on my dear clunker here, don't you worry...
